channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Where home buyers have landed the best deals we’ve seen on houses in over a decade
item.description: Home buyers are scoring big discounts, on both new and existing homes. Here’s where the deals are, and where buyers are still paying above the asking ...

item.title: Silver plunges into a bear market for the first time since 2022. Here’s how long it may last.
item.description: A more than 30% one-day drop in silver late last week pulled prices for the metal into a bear market for the first time since 2022.

item.title: How the stock market’s big turnaround on Monday put the S&P 500 back in record territory
item.description: Small-caps and other signs of the ‘rotation’ beyond mega-cap tech were out in force to start February

item.title: SpaceX officially acquires xAI. Here’s how Elon Musk justifies the move.
item.description: Musk says the newest merger of companies he owns is necessary to create “a sentient sun to understand the universe.”

item.title: What would end this government shutdown — and how tax refunds and air travel are affected in the meantime
item.description: A partial U.S. government shutdown entered its third day Monday, but the closure is widely expected to be short-lived.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...
